Transform Your Life After 40

This site is a comprehensive resource for all men over 40 years old who are looking to transform their physique, energy levels, and libido and become the timeless masculine machine they always intended to be.

As we age, numerous external and internal factors combine to affect us and lead to fatigue, listlessness, weakness, depression, and a feeling of malaise. The formula to reverse this is not complex, it just requires honest and accurate assessment and resolution.

The most critical factor is replacement of youthful testosterone levels. Beyond Testosterone Replacement, supervised by a licensed provider, strength training and diet optimization are important as well, and several other factors contribute such as quality of sleep, stress management, and others.

Utilize the below tools and calculators to begin your journey to transform into the ultimate male you, join our community of like minded guys to discuss and collaborate, and schedule a booking call to discuss our 12 month guaranteed transformation program based on 1 on 1 personal coaching and supervision.

Supplementation

Essential Supplements for Men Over 40

Important supplements for men over 40 to help control blood sugar levels, promote natural testosterone production, increase blood circulation, provide preworkout and post workout energy and recovery, and maintain optimal protein intake. For blood sugar control, we recommend Gluco Care Full Spectrum.

Blood Sugar Control

Gluco Care Full Spectrum, Berberine, Chromium, Alpha Lipoic Acid

Mental Focus

NeuroActiv 6, Lion's Mane, Bacopa, Ginkgo Biloba

Testosterone Support

Critical T Testosterone Booster, Zinc, Magnesium, D3, Boron

Vitality and Prostate Health

ProstaVie - Powerhouse Prostate, EndoPump Male Performance Powerhouse

Blood Flow

L-Citrulline, Beetroot Extract, Pine Bark

Pre-Workout

Caffeine, Beta-Alanine, L-Theanine

Recovery

BCAAs, Creatine, L-Glutamine

Protein Support

Whey Isolate, Casein, EAAs
